author: By JENNIFER PELTZ and COLLEEN LONG
title: US deaths top 1,000 as $2.2 trillion in virus aid approved
description: NEW YORK (AP) — U.S. deaths from the coronavirus pandemic have topped 1,000, in another grim milestone for a global outbreak that is taking lives and wreaking havoc on economies and established routines of ordinary life.
content:
NEW YORK (AP) U.S. deaths from the coronavirus pandemic have topped 1,000, in another grim milestone for a global outbreak that is taking lives and wreaking havoc on economies and established routines of ordinary life.
